text: ovun “salihvada, ohuge pavule udaviyavada ‘api ratriyedima vinasa kara damannemu. (meya kisivekutat pavasanne næta)’ yayi allah mata divra ganu mænava! pasuva ‘ohuge puvale udaviya kapa damana lada sthanayata pæminiyema næta. niyata vasayenma api ættama kiyannemu’ yayi ohuge araksakayinta kiyamu” yayi (taman tula) kiya gatha
